description:
There’s nothing more stressful than seeing your phone’s battery life drain down to nothing when you still have hours left in the day, which is why you should always have a power bank as backup.

And right now, this high-capacity Baseus power bank is a steal for under $27 on Amazon. To get this price, you’ll need to be an Amazon Prime member and you’ll need the coupon code H6TU5WT3. (If you don’t have Prime, you can still use the coupon code and get it for $33.)

A power bank with 30,000mAh capacity at this price is absolutely bonkers, enough to get you over 5 full charges with most phones. It’s perfect to have on you wherever you go, especially if you have multiple devices you want t
title: This $60 high-capacity Baseus power bank is on sale for $27 right now
